description:
The gang looks outside one day to see the world covered in white! And so Chi-chan and company head out to play in the snow. They use the PriPri Shot to try to order a snow hut, and then...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ugo Ugo! Yukiotoko to Asobu Dechi!
Ugo, Ugo! Playing with a Yeti!
ウゴウゴ! 雪男とあそぶでち!
